bibl.title: The Four Greek Hymns of Isidorus and the Cult of Isis.
bibl.seg: Vanderlip Vera Frederika, The Four Greek Hymns of Isidorus and the Cult of Isis. (American Studies in Papyrology. 12.)
Toronto, A.M. Hakkert, 1972, 4°, xvi-108 pp. et XV pll.

C.R. par Étienne Bernand, BibO 31 (1974) pp. 81-84. - J. Gwyn Griffiths, JEA 60 (1974) pp. 284-285. - Michel Malaise, Latomus 35 (1976) pp. 450-451. - Roger A. Pack, AJP 96 (1975) pp. 104-105. - J. Pegueroles, StPap 12 (1973) pp. 116-117. - Vincent Tran Tam Tinh, Phoenix 28 (1974) pp. 271-273. - R.E. Witt, JHS 94 (1974) pp. 215-216.
